subject: fix(interest-form): add retry logic and mobile resilience for fetch failures
body:
Debug report from mobile Chrome Android showed TypeError: Failed to fetch
after 628ms with API Reachable diagnostic also failing. Root cause is
likely transient mobile network failure or CORS preflight rejection.

Changes:
- Add single retry with 1.5s backoff for network-level TypeErrors
- Add navigator.onLine pre-check before attempting fetch
- Set explicit mode: 'cors' on fetch for mobile browser compat
- Add navigateFallbackDenylist to Workbox config to prevent service
  worker from interfering with cross-origin API requests
- Differentiate error messages: offline, connection dropped, server
  unreachable (with actionable guidance for each)
- Log attempt numbers and retry state in debug events

Tags: interest-form, mobile, fetch, retry, service-worker, cors
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: interest-form
Semver: patch

title: add retry logic and mobile resilience for fetch failures
